segment.source: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO
segment.target: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO

segment.source: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO
segment.target: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO

segment.source: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO
segment.target: Request Restoration of a Deleted GPO

segment.source: Unless you are an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you must request the restoration of a deleted Group Policy Object (GPO) from the Recycle Bin to return it to the archive.
segment.target: Unless you are an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you must request the restoration of a deleted Group Policy Object (GPO) from the Recycle Bin to return it to the archive.

segment.source: A user account with the Editor role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Editor role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To request the restoration of a deleted GPO
segment.target: To request the restoration of a deleted GPO

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab, click the Recycle Bin tab to display the deleted GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab, click the Recycle Bin tab to display the deleted GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO you want to restore, and then click Restore.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO you want to restore, and then click Restore.

segment.source: Unless you have special permission to restore GPOs, you must submit a request for restoration of the deleted GPO.
segment.target: Unless you have special permission to restore GPOs, you must submit a request for restoration of the deleted GPO.

segment.source: To receive a copy of the request, type your e-mail address in the Cc field.
segment.target: To receive a copy of the request, type your e-mail address in the Cc field.

segment.source: Type a comment to be displayed in the audit trail for the GPO, and then click Submit.
segment.target: Type a comment to be displayed in the audit trail for the GPO, and then click Submit.

segment.source: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.
segment.target: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.

segment.source: The GPO is removed from the Recycle Bin tab and is displayed on the Controlled tab.
segment.target: The GPO is removed from the Recycle Bin tab and is displayed on the Controlled tab.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If a GPO was deleted from the production environment, restoring it to the archive will not automatically redeploy it to the production environment.
segment.target: If a GPO was deleted from the production environment, restoring it to the archive will not automatically redeploy it to the production environment.

segment.source: To return the GPO to the production environment, deploy the GPO.
segment.target: To return the GPO to the production environment, deploy the GPO.

segment.source: For information, see Request Deployment of a GPO.
segment.target: For information, see Request Deployment of a GPO.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be an Editor to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Editor to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Edit Settings permission for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Edit Settings permission for the GPO.

segment.source: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.
segment.target: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO, and then click Withdraw.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO, and then click Withdraw.

segment.source: The GPO will be returned to the Recycle Bin tab.
segment.target: The GPO will be returned to the Recycle Bin tab.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Deleting or Restoring a GPO
segment.target: Deleting or Restoring a GPO
